No offense but wheres the point in complaining in public about Yan "taking =
it out on you in public."


      From:  "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h.=
..>
      Date:  Fri Mar 16, 2001 5:28pm
      Subject:  YAN!!!!!!!!!!!

  =
   
      Yan:

       I have one thing to say to you. Actually, several. O=
ne, Megan and I both came up with that idea, so you have no reason to pull =
that S@#$ on me. Two, just because you don't like me and are jealous of Meg=
an and I's friendship, you have no right to take it out on me in public for=
m and if you were such a good person, you wouldn't let your personal emotio=
ns over-ride your brain and do something stupid like this. I've read some o=
f the stuff you've said and they're just as  "sick and twisted" as mine, he=
ll, they've been worse. If you have a problem with my spending time with me=
gan or with the way I write my posts, then take it up with me and private a=
nd not in public. Do you understand? I am VERY angry with the way you handl=
ed this situation and I wouldn't be suprised if Megan was too! We work on m=
y posts together as to not offend you, you have no right doing this to me!!=
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
